thought: To craft a stone pickaxe, I first need to craft a stick. To craft a stick, I need to place two spruce_stem (or any other wood) in the crafting grid. Since I have a spruce_stem at slot 32, I will move it to slot 1 in the crafting grid.
Ok
act: move from slot 32 to slot 1 with quantity 1
